channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Endpoint Application Control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Endpoint Application Control

item.title: CVE-2018-10357|2024-08-05T07:39:06.874Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20endpoint%20application%20control
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in Trend Micro Endpoint Application Control 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations due to a flaw in the FileDrop servlet. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
